byline.contributor: Eugene Palumbo contributed reporting from San Salvador.

abstract: Rev Dean Brackley, Jesuit priest who served in El Salvador, dies at age 65.
snippet: The Jesuit priest moved to the San Salvador university dormitory where six priests and two women were murdered by government forces in 1989.
lead_paragraph: The Jesuit priest moved to the San Salvador university dormitory where six priests and two women were murdered by government forces in 1989.

headline.main: Rev. Dean Brackley, 65, Dies; Served in El Salvador
headline.print_headline: Rev. Dean Brackley, 65, Dies; Served in El Salvador
headline.seo: Rev. Dean Brackley, 65, Dies; Moved to El Salvador After Massacre
